recommendations: Shachindra Saxena ‚ÄúVishal is an excellent guy to work with. I worked with him when we're having a small team and chasing a big aspiration. He was full of ideas and was contributing to the growth of the region. He was a people's manager and leads a team with empathy. He was always asking for more responsibility and was not limited to his particular role. This helped us to deliver more with a small team. He was focused on results and deliver them with full accountability. I wish him the best for the future. ‚Äù

Piyush Dahiya ‚ÄúVishal is a hard working professional focussed on getting things done and achieve the results irrespective of how the odds are stacked. He is full of energy and keeps on improving himself. He has the knack of understanding the nuances and business levers and manage effectively. ‚Äù
